jd: Greetings, We have the below requirement with our Client. Kindly go through the JD below and let me know your interest. Position: Supply Chain Product Manager Location: Atlanta, GA (Hybrid Tuesday to Thursday) – Need Local candidates Only Duration: 12+ Months Contract Need USC, H1B & H4 EAD candidates only. LinkedIn & Passport Number Must for Submission. Need 10+ years’ experience Description: Note: Supply chain domain experience is mandatory. Jira story creation with acceptance criteria. Task acceptance on completion. Conduct user interviews and clarify developer questions. Bridge between end users and engineering team for end user acceptance Backlog grooming. Participate and drive sprint ceremonies as needed. Document relevant information in Confluence. Experience in supply chain and warehouse management preferred, but not required.
